content: these are cute and small enough for a newborn crochet the ruffle for a girl and leave it off for a boy they crochet up fast and stay on very well formerly available on geocities as easy newborn socks wayback link 1 october 1 2011 website registration expired still available at this archived link 2 1 http //web archive org/web/20080516034531/http //www geocities com/lindaslists/newbornsocks htm 2 http //web archive org/web/20100628174557/http //www lindaslists net/newbornsocks htm
